author: Elastic
Austin Songer
description: Identifies the creation of an Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) Security Group.
false_positives: A RDS security group may be created by a system or network administrator. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Security group creations from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: AWS RDS Security Group Creation
note:
## Config

The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:rds.amazonaws.com and event.action:CreateDBSecurityGroup and event.outcome:success
